info.name: sRGB to and from Linear Light
info.description:
Based on tsone's "Just A Linear Gradient", found here: https://www.shadertoy.com/view/lscGDr

I couldn't find any examples of someone using the actual sRGB standard (no, raising to the 2.2 (or 1/2.2) power is *not* sRGB), so I decided to make one.
